summary: This is a quick mod I made out of strach, im pretty satisfied with the mod I hope you are to! :D
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a RETEXTURE of Glass Armor, This retexture was fairly simple to make but stands out me, I would say its Paladin gear, but I going to name it Holy Glass Armor. I also included the shield in this and both FEMALE AND MALE armor :D. If you find any texturing problems are downloading problems PLEASE feel free to ask.  Just message me 

Previous Mod-
DaedricScale Armor- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21340

Thank you for supporting me and if you need anyhelp feel free to ask my buddy- Xescream - All he asks in return is shout outs and kodous :-)

Holy Glass Armor with crosses- is just Holy Glass Armor but added some crosses It was a HD picture I put on but you have to under stand that it dosnt stay that way, It still looks good for 3rd person and if you play in first then it dosnt matter thanks :D
author: Jadetowers1
